mapper.insert: insert into dm_message(message_no, room_no, message_sender, message_content, message_send_time) values(#{messageNo}, #{roomNo}, #{messageSender}, #{messageContent}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select message_no, room_no, message_sender, message_content, message_send_time from dm_message where room_no = #{roomNo} order by message_send_time asc
